label: Up/Down Thrust
info: Trend count the consecutive higher higher (up) /lower lows (down).  Reverse counts the break from the last consecutive trend.  Streak counts the nubmer of days an asset has been rising/falling rapidly.  It is calculated by price being outside of ema 14 and ema 50, and ema 14 being outside of ema 50.

label: Supply Demand
info: Daily supply and demand zone.  Min/Max of today's price.

label: Candle
info: Candle Stick Pattern, Morning/Evening Star and Engulfing Pattern
